Mutate dodged the first but the second did serious
damage to his right leg. He once again flew around
behind Megatron. He fired 4 more bolts from his stun
rifle still trying to ground his enemy.

--- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
> Megatron fluidly back flipped over the bolt, his arm
> dangling
> dangerously, his heavy cannon smacking his chest,
> but more just annoying
> the tyrant. He quickly raised his still functioning
> arm, and his recoil
> cannon folded under, and fired two blasts at the
> mutates legs.
> 
>
--------------------------------------------------------------------
> "Life support systems, stable." The computer hummed.
> Then a soft groan
> could be heard.
>
